title: 📁 Drag or click to select a folder ➜ a Markdown directory tree will be generated automatically.
hideLabel: Hide folders or files by clicking or entering custom names：
inputPlaceholder: Please enter the complete file name
dropZoneText: 📂 Drag and drop a folder here, or click this area to select one.
note:
This website is a purely frontend application.
All operations are executed within your browser.
No data is uploaded or stored on any backend server, so you can use it with confidence.
